entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@seanhannity @realDonaldTrump Talking points for #Hannity shows this week : 

1. The benefits of disinfectant & the human condition .
2. Hydroxychloroquine, where is it now?
3. Review of the ‘many months” Trump has been stuck in the WH.
4. Covid19 - The Hoax Timeline- a Hoax!
5. President Obama’s tan suit.
